name: MAUAX Founder #001 - Pedra Fundamental
description: Este NFT (MAUAX-G) representa a Pedra Fundamental do ecossistema MAUAX, simbolizando o início da parceria e a fundação da MAUAX DAO. Destinado à Prefeitura de Mauá.
image_prompt: Create a hyper-realistic 3D render of a commemorative medallion. It has a brushed stainless steel center disk and a translucent acrylic ring in the color 'Future Dusk' (#3E406D). The following text must be engraved on the metal, exactly as written: On the top, write 'MAUAX-G'. In the center, write 'Prefeitura de Mauá'. On the bottom, write 'Founder\'s Edition · #0001'. The style is a professional product shot with studio lighting.

name: MAUAX Seed Round NFT
description: Este Security Token (ERC-721) representa a participação total na rodada de investimento de R$ 15 Milhões para a Fase 0 de estruturação do Projeto MAUAX.
image_prompt: A hyper-realistic 3D render of a platinum and crystal medallion. In the center, the text 'MAUAX SEED' is engraved. Around the edge, the text 'R$ 15.000.000,00 - FASE 0'. The style is premium, financial, and secure, like a platinum credit card. Studio lighting, dark background.
